text: Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 101. Should any bhikkhunī lie down together (in the same dwelling) with an unordained woman for more than two or three consecutive nights, it is to be confessed.
